document.full_text: the success-starved dallas mavericks will have to stop the explosive scoring runs by the miami heat if they are going to win their first nba championship, coach rick carlisle said on monday.
document.title: mavericks looking for a complete game against the heat
lines_and_colors: the success-starved dallas mavericks will have to stop the explosive scoring runs by the miami heat if they are going to win their first nba championship, coach rick carlisle said on monday.
